data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 198 believers in Hope Town, Bahamas who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hope Town, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Hope Town, Bahamas to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Hope Town to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 198 believers find a person of peace today among the 302 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 500 citizens of the the state of Hope Town.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Hope Town, Bahamas.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Hope Town hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
